lessonDesc: Master how to choose the correct pronoun depending on the context of a sentence.
Identify whether a sentence is declarative, interrogative, imperative, or exclamatory.
Learn how to correctly use verbs in the simple present tense.
Practice forming grammatically accurate negative and question sentences.
Learn how to start simple conversations and ask polite questions.
Practice using common phrases in daily interactions and making small talk.
Form clear and grammatically correct questions and negative sentences.
Practice writing accurate statements using proper grammar and punctuation.
Organize your ideas into meaningful short paragraphs with clarity.
Improve reading fluency by exploring short and engaging texts.
Enhance comprehension by identifying meaning through sentence context.
Practice understanding key words and phrases in short audio clips.
Focus on recognizing questions, tone, and meaning in conversation.
